content:
Which part of the neuron is responsible for receiving information from other neurons?
A. Axon
B. Dendrites
C. Soma
D. Synapse

B. Dendrites

Dendrites are the branched projections of a neuron that receive signals from other neurons and transmit the electrochemical stimulation received from them to the cell body or soma of the neuron. This process is crucial for the integration and transmission of information within the nervous system.
